question: Can you help me plan a one-week road trip through California, highlighting must-see destinations?
true_answer: Here is a detailed itinerary for your California road trip, highlighting top destinations like San Francisco, Yosemite, Los Angeles, and more.

steps.description: Identify major cities and attractions in California
Generate visual guides for key locations

plan.current_objective: Create a comprehensive road trip itinerary for California

memory_state.shared_knowledge: The itinerary includes visits to San Francisco, Yosemite National Park, Los Angeles, and San Diego with optimal travel routes and stops.

steps.content: Can you help me plan a one-week road trip through California, highlighting must-see destinations?
Creating plan for road trip itinerary: 1) Identify key cities and attractions, 2) Determine travel logistics, 3) Develop daily itinerary, 4) Generate visual guides.
Decomposing tasks into components: research destinations, calculate travel times, plan daily activities, and create visual aids.
Searching for major California attractions and cities including San Francisco, Yosemite, Los Angeles, etc.
Identified key destinations: San Francisco, Yosemite National Park, Los Angeles, Anaheim, and San Diego.
Marking destination research complete and updating shared knowledge.
Assigning travel logistics research to browser_use_agent.
Calculating optimal routes and travel times between destinations.
Optimal travel route identified: San Francisco > Yosemite > Los Angeles > San Diego. Approximate travel time: 25 hours.
Creating a detailed 7-day itinerary based on destinations and travel times.
Itinerary ready: Day 1-2 San Francisco, Day 3 Yosemite, Day 4-5 Los Angeles, Day 6 Anaheim, Day 7 San Diego.
Assigning visual guide generation to media_agent.
Generating images and maps for each destination.
Here is a detailed itinerary for your California road trip, highlighting top destinations like San Francisco, Yosemite, Los Angeles, and more.
